original_text: And the believers from among the circumcised who had come with Peter were amazed, because the gift of the Holy Spirit was poured out even on the Gentiles.
korean_text: 베드로와 함께 온 할례 받은 신자들이 이방인들에게도 성령 부어 주심으로 말미암아 놀라니

sentences.original_text: And the believers from among the circumcised
because the gift of the Holy Spirit
was poured out even on the Gentiles
